Submodules

kexp.base.base module

class kexp.base.base.Base(setup_camera=True, absorption_image=True, save_data=True, camera_select='xy_basler')[source]

Bases: Devices, Cooling, Image, Dealer, Cameras, Scanner, Scribe

compute_new_derived()[source]
end(expt_filepath)[source]
finish_prepare(N_repeats=[], shuffle=True)[source]

To be called at the end of prepare.

Automatically adds repeats either if specified in N_repeats argument or if previously specified in self.params.N_repeats.

Shuffles xvars if specified (defaults to True). Computes the number of images to be taken from the imaging method and the length of the xvar arrays.

Computes derived parameters within ExptParams.

Accepts an additional compute_derived method that is user defined in the experiment file. This is to allow for recomputation of derived parameters that the user created in the experiment file at each step in a scan. This must be an RPC – no kernel decorator.

init_kernel(run_id=True, init_dds=True, init_dac=True, dds_set=True, dds_off=True, beat_ref_on=True, init_shuttler=True, init_lightsheet=True, setup_awg=True)[source]
init_scan_kernel()[source]

This method is run between each shot just before scan_kernel.
